amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt the Department of Veterans Affairs from the requirements of the bill as they relate to rulemaking for the availability of affordable medication and effective healthcare management for veterans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 10 printed in part B of House Report 114-230 to exempt the Department of Veterans Affairs from the requirements of this legislation as they relate to rulemaking for the availability of affordable medication and effective healthcare management for veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 239 (Roll no. 480).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 239 (Roll no. 480).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Pocan.
